item.title: Rock Picker Trouble! Three Times Used, Three Breakdowns
item.description: Three uses, three breakdowns. I’ll tell you the story of a rock picker that failed immediately and the time-consuming challenge of getting this machine working correctly.

media:content.media:title: Rock Picker Trouble! Three Times Used, Three Breakdowns
media:content.media:description: Three uses, three breakdowns. I’ll tell you the story of a rock picker that failed immediately and the time-consuming challenge of getting this machine working correctly.

item.title: This Could Be A Bad Deal!
item.description: What happens when a deal looks too good to be true?

item.title: We’re Done Messing Around!! Crop Chaser 1000!
item.description: The easy approach wasn't working, so we brought in the best equipment. This video shows the Crop Chaser 1000 tackling a heavy-duty job, showing you what it takes to finish the project fast and efficiently.

item.title: Red One Down!! Time To Upgrade?
item.description: Our trusty machine is officially down. Join us as we diagnose the major breakdown and seriously consider whether it’s time to retire the equipment and invest in a newer, more powerful model.

item.title: Was This A Good Idea??
item.description: Was This A Good Idea??

item.title: Busting Out Old Iron To Fight Mother Nature!
item.description: When a job gets tough, you bring in the vintage equipment. This video documents our fight against challenging conditions, showing the sheer power of old iron getting the job done

item.title: I Ruined My Pickup Truck
item.description: This is the personal story of a challenging repair. We'll show you the full extent of the damage to my pickup truck and the long, costly process of bringing it back to life.

item.title: Finishing What He Started!! Taking Down The Barn!
item.description: A difficult job required a big effort. This video documents the final stage of a barn demolition and the hard work it took to finish what was started.

item.title: The Problem Just Won’t Go Away! Still Plugged
item.description: Sometimes a problem just won't go away. This video documents our frustrating journey to solve a persistent issue, showing you the challenges and the unexpected solutions we tried.

item.title: We Crushed Our Grain Tank Auger!!
item.description: What happens when a major piece of equipment breaks down? This is the story of a difficult and costly repair and the hard work it took to get the job done right.

item.title: Harvest Preparation! 3 Tarps in 4 Hours!
item.description: Can we install three tarps in four hours? This video documents the timed challenge of getting our grain haul equipment ready for the busiest season of the year.

item.title: How Our Farm Runs! A Behind-The-Scenes Equipment Tour
item.description: Ever wonder what it takes to run a farm? This video is a behind-the-scenes tour of our equipment, showing you the machines that help us get the job done and why they are so important.

item.title: Combine Dies With Less Than 400 Hours!!!
item.description: A major combine failure after less than 400 hours of use. This video documents the unexpected problems we faced with a new machine and the costly process of finding out what went wrong.

item.title: Making Upgrades To Our Equipment!
item.description: What if a few upgrades could make a huge difference? This video documents the process of improving our equipment and shows you how a few simple upgrades can make our machinery more efficient.

item.title: The Grain Pits Are Flooding
item.description: Heavy rain causes flooding in the grain pits, creating challenges on the farm as the crew works quickly to manage the water and protect the harvest.

item.title: New Project: Clearing Grandma’s Lawn
item.description: The Larson Farms crew kicks off a fresh project by clearing out Grandma’s lawn, showing the first steps of turning an overgrown yard into usable space.

item.title: We Got The World's Biggest Grain Cart Stuck!
item.description: It was a huge problem. We'll show you what it was like to get our biggest grain cart stuck and the difficult process of getting it out of the field.

item.title: Testing the Crop Chaser 1000
item.description: The Larson Farms crew puts the Crop Chaser 1000 to work in the field, showing how this machine boosts efficiency and makes harvest smoother.

item.title: S790 Combine Gets a Track Makeover
item.description: What does it take to give a combine's tracks a makeover? This video is a guide to the challenging process of replacing the tracks on a S790 combine for a smoother, more efficient ride.

item.title: Finishing What He Started! Taking Down The Barn!
item.description: The time had come to finish the job. This video shows a look at the powerful equipment we used to take down an old barn and make way for a new project.
